entry.title: Fantasy
entry.summary: This gallery features various pictures with elements of the fantastic, plus a couple of still life paintings. Alice meets the…
entry.content: This gallery features various pictures with elements of the fantastic, plus a couple of still life paintings.

entry.title: City & Landscape
entry.summary: A selection of the many landscapes and city subjects that I hve painted over the years. Some of these pictures…
entry.content: A selection of the many landscapes and city subjects that I hve painted over the years. Some of these pictures are painted from life and others have been composed using photographic references.

entry.title: Gothic
entry.summary: I have always been fascinated by ruins and overgrown churchyards, I don't know why. I live near Abney Park in…
entry.content: I have always been fascinated by ruins and overgrown churchyards, I don't know why. I live near Abney Park in Stoke Newington, a rambling Victorian cemetery, and over the years I have painted a number of pictures inspired by the various statues and the atmosphere of the place.

entry.title: Portraits
entry.summary: I have painted numerous portraits over the years including many commissions. Most of these pictures have been painted from life…
entry.content: I have painted numerous portraits over the years including many commissions. Most of these pictures have been painted  from life with photographic references to help with working out the backgrounds. Some of these paintings are still in my possession and are for sale.

entry.title: Various
entry.summary: This gallery contains a variety of pictures both old and new, including a few of my drawings and some canvas…
entry.content: This gallery contains a variety of pictures both old and new, including a few of my drawings and some canvas prints. All of these works are for sale at reasonable prices.

entry.title: Fabric Painting
entry.summary: Most of the images in this gallery are painted onto T Shirts using Pebeo Fabric Paint. Many of the subjects…
entry.content: Most of the images in this gallery are painted onto T Shirts using Pebeo Fabric Paint. Many of the subjects reflect my interest in Reggae Music.

entry.title: Biography
entry.summary: II was born in 1956 and I began painting in oils when I was twelve years old. When I was…
entry.content:
II was born in 1956 and I began painting in oils when I was twelve years old. When I was seventeen I attended a two-year Foundation Course and I also have a Ba Honours degree in Fine Art and a City and Guilds Teaching Certificate. I have taught in schools and I've also given private tuition. I teach basic drawing skills, especially from life, and painting and drawing technique as these are things that can be taught.

For more information please visit the 'About Me' blog.

Curriculum Vitae

1973 - 75 - Colchester School of Art Foundation Course.

1975 - 76 - Leicester Polytechnic, first year of a degree course completed.

1985 - Various murals with a rogues gallery featuring portraits of famous gangsters at the La Prison nightclub, London N16.

1987 - October - Bloomsbury Theatre - London WC1.

1993 - 94 - Middlesex University, Ba Honours degree in Fine Art completed.

1995 - April - Studio Sienko - London SE1.

2000 - April - Sutton House - London E9.

2003 - May - First Edition - London E14. 

2004 - December - Eye Opener - Group Show - various locations - London N16.

2000 - 2005 - Mural design and numerous commissions undertaken for Clegg Gifford insurance brokers based in Whitechapel, London E1.

2005 - June - A Lotus in Bloom - Group Show - Oxford House London E2.

2006 - July - Global Families - Group Show - Oxford House London E2.

2006 - February - First Edition - London E14.

2006 - July - August - Stoke Newington Festival - various locations - London N16.

2006 - November - Group show in the Rochester Castle, London N16.

2007 - Islington Contemporary Art and Design Fair - London N1.

2012 - November - First Edition - London E14.

2013 - January - Abney Park Visitors Centre - London N16.

2014 - June - Curwen Gallery - short listed for the Curwen Art Prize - London W1.

2014 - October - Taplow Court Culture Centre - Maidenhead.
